summary: A rich man's wife goes on a trip to a cabin with her husband. He's preoccupied with business and leaves early. A man she meets offers to kill her husband. He's crazy and she leaves. He later tracks down the couple.
cast: Halle Berry|Peter Greene|Clive Owen|Frankie Faison|Charles Hallahan|Allan Rich|Clea Lewis|Christopher McDonald|Loyda Ramos|William Crossett|Eddie Francis|Lou DiMaggio|Alexandra Hedison|John Paragon|Marc Shelton|Kelly Jo Minter|Marc Lynn|Zoaunne LeRoy|Greg Serano|Michelle C. Bonilla|Rolando Molina|Valente Rodriguez|Michael Marich|Suzanne Michaels|Bruce Wright|Angela Nogaro|Johnny Kim|William Lucking|Marlene Sosebee
